SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.rmi

Interface GameControllerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface GameControllerInterface extends Remote
The GameControllerInterface defines the contract for controlling the gameplay flow of a match, from start to finish. Implementations of this interface are responsible for ensuring that the game progresses according to the rules and managing the interactions between players and the game state.

  • Method Details

    • placeStarterOnCodex

      void placeStarterOnCodex(Player player, Side side) throws RemoteException, Exception
      This method places the Starter card in the Codex.
      Parameters:
      player - The player representing the client.
      side - The side of the Starter card to be placed into the Codex.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs in remote communication.
      Exception - If an abnormal condition has occurred during the execution of the action.

    • placeCardOnCodex

      void placeCardOnCodex(Player player, int index, boolean frontCard, int row, int col) throws RemoteException, Exception
      This method places a card in the Codex.
      Parameters:
      player - The player representing the client.
      index - The index of the card in the player's hand to be placed.
      frontCard - A boolean indicating whether to place the front (true) or back (false) side of the card.
      row - The row in the Codex where the card is to be placed.
      col - The column in the Codex where the card is to be placed.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs in remote communication.
      Exception - If an abnormal condition has occurred during the execution of the action.

    • selectCardObjective

      void selectCardObjective(Player player, int cardObjective) throws RemoteException, Exception
      This method selects the personal Objective card.
      Parameters:
      player - The player representing the client.
      cardObjective - The index of the card in the player's list of Objective cards that the player wishes to select.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs in remote communication.
      Exception - If an abnormal condition has occurred during the execution of the action.

    • drawCardFromDeck

      void drawCardFromDeck(Player player, DeckType deck) throws RemoteException, Exception
      This method draws a card from the deck of cards.
      Parameters:
      player - The player representing the client.
      deck - The deck from which the card is drawn.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs in remote communication.
      Exception - If an abnormal condition has occurred during the execution of the action.

    • drawCardDisplayed

      void drawCardDisplayed(Player player, DeckType deck, int index) throws RemoteException, Exception
      This method draws a card from the visible cards.
      Parameters:
      player - The player representing the client.
      deck - The visible deck from which the card is drawn.
      index - The index of the card in the displayed deck that the player wishes to draw.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs in remote communication.
      Exception - If an abnormal condition has occurred during the execution of the action.
